00036 #import "RCBasicAuthProvider.h"
00037 
00038 #import "NSDataAdditions.h"
00039 
00040 @interface RCBasicAuthProvider()
00041 - (void) addAuthHeader:(NSMutableURLRequest *)urlRequest;
00042 - (NSString *) encodedCredentials;
00043 @end
00044 
00045 @implementation RCBasicAuthProvider
00046 
00047 @synthesize username;
00048 @synthesize password;
00049 
00050 + (id) withUsername:(NSString *)username password:(NSString *)password {
00051     RCBasicAuthProvider *provider = [self new];
00052     provider.username = username;
00053     provider.password = password;
00054     return provider;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 // ========================================================================== //
00059 
00060 #pragma mark - RCAuthProvider
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 - (void) authorizeRequest:(NSMutableURLRequest *)urlRequest {
00065         [self addAuthHeader:urlRequest];
00066 }
00067 
00068 - (NSURLCredential *) credentialForAuthenticationChallenge:(NSURLAuthenticationChallenge *)challenge {
00069         return [NSURLCredential credentialWithUser:self.username password:self.password persistence:NSURLCredentialPersistenceNone];
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 // ========================================================================== //
00074 
00075 #pragma mark - Helpers
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079 - (void) addAuthHeader:(NSMutableURLRequest *)urlRequest {
00080         NSString *encodedCredentials = [self encodedCredentials];
00081         if(encodedCredentials) {
00082                 [urlRequest setValue:encodedCredentials forHTTPHeaderField:@"Authorization"];
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 - (NSString *) encodedCredentials {
00087         NSString *encoded = nil;
00088         if(self.username && [self.username length] > 0
00089            && self.password && [self.password length] > 0) {
00090                 NSString *string = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@:%@",self.username,self.password];
00091                 NSData *stringData = [string dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00092                 NSString *base64String = [stringData base64Encoding];
00093                 encoded = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"Basic %@",base64String];
00094         }
00095         return encoded;
00096 }
00097 
00098 @end
